text:
The other thing I really like is your feeling more comfortable about taking your outside shot ( >10 feet. ) From the baseline is always going to be
difficult but it’s something we can work on. It’s a great weapon to have in your bag when you can just nail that.
I also think it would be super to spend some time in either training clinics or camps soon to work on ball handling. With your Hoops IQ, along with
being smaller and quicker, you’re gonna be most successful at either the one or two slot. So let’s train for that.
Keep up the great work, Adrian. You’re doing awesome and it’s amazing to watch you grow as a player and a young man every week.
You really make me proud.
-dad
Message 2278 of 4024
Not pointing fingers. I’m trying to co-parent. This one landed after 11:30 pm. So not sure if we need to see if someone is sneaking up past his
bedtime.
Please don’t make me the bad guy. These alerts are doing just what they are supposed to be doing, so parents can be sure kids are playing by the rules.
All this shit was set up with good intentions so you and I, as responsible parents could use technology and appearances to protect our family and
property.
